topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552c9c5b636872775c390000#post_552c9c5b636872775c390000
When I was a kid I had trouble controlling my emotions in school like yuki. Granted, I never ripped off another kid's ear but still. And ame is basically what I fantasized about being as a kid. I wanted to be something else and go on adventures and shit (I blame american dragon and digimon frontier)
Plus my mom has super powers. 

That stuff (and a couple of other things I'd rather not bring up) are the reason I think this movie hit me so hard. I related to it _a lot_. I think it would have still hit me pretty hard even without that suff though. I just think I wouldn't currently still be crying. Like, maybe I'd have stopped about 15 minutes ago. 
^-also thank you for showing this movie because I really enjoyed it or whatever-^

"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552c9ca26368720bbede0600#post_552c9ca26368720bbede0600
